summary: Tested P1/P2 features: SEO meta tags, Blog article pages, Testimonials carousel (10 reviews), and language switching. Most features working correctly. Critical issue: react-helmet-async meta tags (description, keywords, OG tags) not rendering - only title works. Language switching updates content but NOT SEO meta tags.

integration_issues.issue: react-helmet-async not rendering meta description, keywords, and Open Graph tags. Only title tag works. Meta description shows default 'A product of emergent.sh' from index.html instead of SEO content.
When switching language (UZ->RU), page content updates correctly but SEO title and meta tags do NOT update. HTML lang attribute also doesn't change.

action_items: Fix react-helmet-async integration - meta tags not rendering (description, keywords, OG tags)
Ensure SEO meta tags update when language is switched
Consider removing hardcoded meta description from index.html or ensure Helmet overrides it
critical_code_review_comments: SEOHead component code looks correct but Helmet tags not appearing in DOM - may need to check HelmetProvider setup or react-helmet-async version compatibility with React 19
index.html has hardcoded meta description that may conflict with Helmet

success_rate.frontend: 85% - Core features work, SEO meta tags issue

context_for_next_testing_agent: P1/P2 features tested: 1) SEO title tags work on all pages (home, service, boiler, blog article) but meta description/keywords/OG tags NOT rendering. 2) Blog article pages (/blog/:slug) work perfectly with full content, sections, warning box, conclusion. 3) Testimonials carousel has 10 reviews with working prev/next navigation and pagination dots. 4) Language switching updates page content but NOT SEO tags. 5) Mobile responsive works well for testimonials and blog pages.

seo_title_home.details: Title: ServicePlyus - Katyol Ta'mirlash Toshkentda | Gaz Kotlov Remonti 24/7

seo_meta_description.details: Shows 'A product of emergent.sh' instead of SEO content - react-helmet-async not working

seo_keywords.details: Keywords meta tag not found in DOM

seo_og_tags.details: Open Graph tags not found in DOM

seo_service_page.details: Title: Katyol Diagnostikasi Toshkentda | Bepul Tekshirish - ServicePlyus

seo_boiler_page.details: Title: Baxi Katyol Remonti Toshkentda | ServicePlyus

blog_page.details: Blog page loads with 3 articles and category filters

blog_article_content.details: Full article content displayed with 6 sections, warning box, conclusion, related articles

testimonials_carousel.details: 10 testimonials with carousel navigation (prev/next buttons), 4 pagination dots, shows '10 ta sharhdan 1-3 ko'rsatilmoqda'

testimonials_navigation.details: Next/prev buttons work, carousel moves between pages correctly

language_switch_content.details: Page content switches from UZ to RU correctly (navbar, hero text, etc.)

language_switch_seo.details: SEO title and HTML lang attribute do NOT update when language is switched

mobile_responsive_home.details: Home page displays correctly on mobile (390x844)

mobile_responsive_testimonials.details: Testimonials section visible with navigation buttons on mobile

mobile_responsive_blog.details: Blog page and article page display correctly on mobile

rca_of_issue.root_cause: Likely compatibility issue between react-helmet-async v2.0.5 and React 19, or HelmetProvider not properly wrapping the app. The Helmet component is setting the title correctly but meta tags are not being injected into the DOM.
reproduction_steps: 2. Inspect page source or use browser dev tools
3. Check meta tags - only default 'A product of emergent.sh' description present
4. Keywords and OG tags completely missing
potential_solutions: 1. Check if react-helmet-async is compatible with React 19 - may need to use react-helmet instead
2. Verify HelmetProvider is at the root level and properly configured
3. Remove hardcoded meta description from index.html to avoid conflicts
4. Consider using Next.js Head or alternative SEO solution
